text: Akum'busya (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ya ukana ni juga. Jilani: “Mu yalakwemo mwana ulemwa wekulungwa kwisa soni (ine) yakamuchisya ku ŵandu, nambo ulemwa wakweo uŵele wekulungwa nnope kupunda yakamuchisya yakweyo.” Soni niakum'busya kuti ana chichi chachatole? Jilani: “Chakupunda (pa yakulajila yenu).” Iyyoyopeyo niyakutiji Allah pakusalichisya kukwenu ma Ȃya (ga malamusi) kuti m'be ŵaganisya
